author: Katie Stocks
description: An autumnal sounding cocktail to be enjoyed in place of a Daiquiri at any time of the year. Yes, it's appley with delicate armagnac undertones and complexity, but it is made interesting by the birch spirit which gives this drink faint pine, almost smoky bacon notes.
name: The Windfall
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) fine strain into chilled glass
